name: Meow Legion
description:
Meow Legion is a game about assembling an army of cats to defend against waves of enemies.

  • I made this game because I like cats.
  • controller recommended.
  • Left mouse button/RT to shoot.
  • Right mouse button/LT to recall cats.
  • Recall allows your cats to defend for you and pick up items.

  • Total 10 types of cats
  • You get stronger every time you lose. You will receive a random meow card, each with different attribute bonuses for each cat.

  • Please don't forget to carry a meow card. In the interface shown below, you can select the meow card you wish to carry into battle. Each cat can only carry one meow card per battle.
  • Upgrade your cat cards: There are three levels of cat cards, and the higher the level, the more attribute boosts you get. You can level up by merging them.
